name: Recalling Social Surrogates - Dataset from Study 2 of work, 'Playing Alone, Feeling Connected: Do Single-Player Video Games with Social Surrogates Replenish Belonging After Social Rejection?'
description: The dataset for Study 2 of Nami Sunami's dissertation, 'Playing Alone, Feeling Connected: Do Single-Player Video Games with Social Surrogates Replenish Belonging After Social Rejection?'.

variableMeasured.name: Race_1
variableMeasured.description: Race - Selected Choice American Indian, Indigenous Canadian, or Alaska Native

variableMeasured.name: Race_7
variableMeasured.description: Race - Selected Choice Latino/Latina, Hispanic, Chicano, or Puerto Rican

variableMeasured.name: Race_8
variableMeasured.description: Race - Selected Choice Middle Eastern or North African

variableMeasured.name: Race_5
variableMeasured.description: Race - Selected Choice Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander

variableMeasured.name: Race_6
variableMeasured.description: Race - Selected Choice Prefer to self-describe

variableMeasured.name: Gender_7
variableMeasured.description: Gender - Selected Choice Prefer to self-describe

variableMeasured.name: Rejection_Essay
variableMeasured.description: Essay written by participants recalling their rejection experience

variableMeasured.name: NonSurrogacy_Essay
variableMeasured.description: Essay written by participants recalling their experience playing a non-surrogacy video game

variableMeasured.name: Surrogacy_Essay
variableMeasured.description: Essay written by participants recalling experience playing a surrogacy video game

variableMeasured.name: Interact_with_NPC
variableMeasured.description: Did you interact with an NPC?

variableMeasured.name: PSI_1
variableMeasured.description: PSI - I carefully followed the behavior of the non-player characters in the game.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_2R
variableMeasured.description: PSI - I hardly thought about why the non-player characters in the game did certain things they did.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_3
variableMeasured.description: PSI - I kept wondering if I knew persons that are similar to the non-player characters in the game.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_4
variableMeasured.description: PSI - I became aware of aspects of the non-player characters in the game that I really liked or disliked.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_5
variableMeasured.description: PSI - I kept asking myself how things would evolve around the non-player characters in the game.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_6
variableMeasured.description: PSI - Occasionally, I wondered if the non-player characters in the game were similar to me or not.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_7
variableMeasured.description: PSI - Sometimes I really loved the non-player characters in the game for what they did.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_8
variableMeasured.description: PSI - If the non-player characters in the game felt bad, I felt bad as well; if the non-player characters in the game felt good, I felt good as well.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_9R
variableMeasured.description: PSI - The non-player characters in the game left me rather sober and unaffected.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_10R
variableMeasured.description: PSI - Whatever the non-player characters in the game said or did—I kept still.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_11
variableMeasured.description: PSI - Occasionally, I said something to the non-player characters in the game on impulse.

variableMeasured.name: PSI_12
variableMeasured.description: PSI - Sometimes I felt like speaking out on the non-player characters in the game.

variableMeasured.name: Single_Immersion
variableMeasured.description: While playing the game, I felt completely immersed.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_1R
variableMeasured.description: NE - At points, I had a hard time making sense of what was going on in the game.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_2R
variableMeasured.description: NE - I had a hard time recognizing the thread of the story in the game.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_3R
variableMeasured.description: NE - I found my mind wandering while I played the game.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_4R
variableMeasured.description: NE - While I was playing the game, I found myself thinking about other things.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_5R
variableMeasured.description: NE - I had a hard time keeping my mind on the game while I played.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_6
variableMeasured.description: NE - While playing, my body was in the room, but my mind was inside the world created by the game.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_7
variableMeasured.description: NE - The game created a new world, and then that world suddenly disappeared when I stopped playing the game.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_8
variableMeasured.description: NE - At times during the gameplay, the world of the video game was closer to me than the real world.

variableMeasured.name: Narrative_Engagement_9
variableMeasured.description: NE - The gameplay affected me emotionally.

variableMeasured.name: OTF_Social_World_1
variableMeasured.description: OTF Social World - The video game presented stories that I immersed myself in

variableMeasured.name: OTF_Social_World_2
variableMeasured.description: OTF Social World - The video game presented another social world where I felt like I belonged

variableMeasured.name: OTF_Social_World_3
variableMeasured.description: OTF Social World - The video game had a social narrative that told an engaging story

variableMeasured.name: OTF_Social_World_4
variableMeasured.description: OTF Social World - I found myself getting “lost” in the game’s story

variableMeasured.name: Enjoyment_1
variableMeasured.description: Enjoyment - I think the game is fun.

variableMeasured.name: Enjoyment_2
variableMeasured.description: Enjoyment - I enjoy playing the game.

variableMeasured.name: Enjoyment_3R
variableMeasured.description: Enjoyment - I feel bored while playing the game.

variableMeasured.name: Enjoyment_4
variableMeasured.description: Enjoyment - I am likely to recommend this game to others.

variableMeasured.name: Enjoyment_5
variableMeasured.description: Enjoyment - If given the chance, I want to play this game again.

variableMeasured.name: VG_When_Played
variableMeasured.description: When did you play the game?

variableMeasured.name: VG_Freqency
variableMeasured.description: How frequently and how long did you play the game?

variableMeasured.name: Attention_Rejection
variableMeasured.description: What did you write in the first essay?

variableMeasured.name: Attention_Rejection_DO_1
variableMeasured.description: What did you write in the first essay? - Display Order about a time I felt rejected

variableMeasured.name: Attention_Rejection_DO_2
variableMeasured.description: What did you write in the first essay? - Display Order about a time I felt accepted

variableMeasured.name: Attention_Rejection_DO_3
variableMeasured.description: What did you write in the first essay? - Display Order about my morning yesterday

variableMeasured.name: Attention_VG
variableMeasured.description: What did you write in the second essay?

variableMeasured.name: Attention_VG_DO_1
variableMeasured.description: What did you write in the second essay? - Display Order ${q://QID3/ChoiceTextEntryValue}

variableMeasured.name: Attention_VG_DO_2
variableMeasured.description: What did you write in the second essay? - Display Order ${q://QID4/ChoiceTextEntryValue}

variableMeasured.name: Attention_VG_DO_3
variableMeasured.description: What did you write in the second essay? - Display Order unsure

variableMeasured.name: Study_Purpose
variableMeasured.description: During the study, did you wonder about the purpose of the study or procedures? If so, what did you think the study was about?

variableMeasured.name: Share_Anything
variableMeasured.description: Is there anything you’d like to share with us about your experience in this study? Please use the space below to explain your answers to any of the previous questions, or to provide any feedback.

variableMeasured.name: attention_rejection_correct
variableMeasured.description: Participant correctly identifying that they wrote a rejection essay

variableMeasured.name: attention_all_correct
variableMeasured.description: Whether all attention check items were correct

variableMeasured.name: essay_condition
variableMeasured.description: Video game essay condition that participant was assigned (social surrogacy vs non-social surrogacy)

variableMeasured.name: FL_8_DO_FL_7
variableMeasured.description: FL_8 - Block Randomizer - Display Order FL_7

variableMeasured.name: FL_8_DO_FL_9
variableMeasured.description: FL_8 - Block Randomizer - Display Order FL_9

variableMeasured.name: parasocial_MC_group
variableMeasured.description: Parasocial relationship coded into 3 groups used for the exploratory manipulation check

variableMeasured.name: attention_VG_correct
variableMeasured.description: Participant correctly identifying the video game that they wrote an essay about

variableMeasured.name: Rejection_Essay_Len
variableMeasured.description: Length of the rejection essay in characters

variableMeasured.name: Surrogacy_Essay_Len
variableMeasured.description: Length of the surrogacy essay in characters

variableMeasured.name: Share_Anything_Len
variableMeasured.description: Length of the free-text response for sharing anything

variableMeasured.name: Study_Purpose_Len
variableMeasured.description: Length of the free-text response for the gussed purpose of the study

variableMeasured.name: Exit_Q_Order
variableMeasured.description: Order in which the exit questions were presented

variableMeasured.name: target_game_name_cl
variableMeasured.description: Target game mentioned for the video game essay

variableMeasured.name: A
variableMeasured.description: Rater A indicating that the participant followed the instructions

variableMeasured.name: B
variableMeasured.description: Rater B indicating that the participant followed the instructions

variableMeasured.name: C
variableMeasured.description: Rater C indicating that the participant followed the instructions

variableMeasured.name: agreeAB
variableMeasured.description: Agreement between Raters A and B

variableMeasured.name: agreeAC
variableMeasured.description: Agreement between Raters A and C

variableMeasured.name: agreeBC
variableMeasured.description: Agreement between Raters B and C

variableMeasured.name: agreeAB_percent
variableMeasured.description: Percent agreement between Raters A and B

variableMeasured.name: agreeAC_percent
variableMeasured.description: Percent agreement between Raters A and C

variableMeasured.name: agreeBC_percent
variableMeasured.description: Percent agreement between Raters B and C

variableMeasured.name: initial_codes
variableMeasured.description: Initial code for whether the participant followed the instructions

variableMeasured.name: followed_VGinstructions
variableMeasured.description: Whether participants followed the instructions for nominating a video game
